title-part.text: DOMESTIC STOVES OR RANGES
DETAILS OF DOMESTIC STOVES OR RANGES, OF GENERAL APPLICATION

note-paragraph.CPC-specific-note: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Stoves or ranges in which the fuel or energy supply is not restricted to solid fuel or to a type covered by a single one of the following groups F24C3/00 - F24C9/00
Stoves or ranges in which the type of fuel or energy supply is not specified
adapted for the use of two or more kinds of fuel or energy supply

reference.text: combinations of two or more stoves or ranges each having a different kind of fuel or energy supply F24C11/00

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24C1/02 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups F24C1/16, F24C3/00, and F24C5/00.
Group F24C1/02 is also impacted by reclassification into group F24C1/14.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: simultaneously

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24C1/04 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F24C1/16.
Group F24C1/04 is also impacted by reclassification into group F24C1/14.
Groups F24C1/16, F24C1/04, and F24C1/14 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: by replacing parts, e.g. replacing burners by electric heaters

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24C1/06 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F24C1/16.
Group F24C1/06 is also impacted by reclassification into group F24C1/14.
Groups F24C1/16, F24C1/06, and F24C1/14 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: solely adapted for radiation heating

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24C1/08 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F24C1/16.
Groups F24C1/16 and F24C1/08 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: with reflectors
of circular shape
Radiation heating stoves and ranges, with additional provision for convection heating

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24C1/14 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups F24C1/02, F24C1/04, F24C1/06, F24C1/16, and F24C3/00.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: with special adaptation for travelling, e.g. collapsible

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24C1/16 is impacted by reclassification into groups F24C1/02, F24C1/04, F24C1/06, F24C1/08, and F24C1/14.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Stoves or ranges for gaseous fuels

reference.text: stoves or ranges specially adapted for the use of two or more kinds of fuel or energy supply F24C1/02

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24C3/00 is impacted by reclassification into groups F24C1/02 and F24C1/14.
Groups F24C3/00, F24C1/02, and F24C1/14 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: with heat produced solely by flame

note.note-paragraph:
Groups F24C3/02, F24C3/022, F24C3/025, and F24C3/027 are incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F24C3/14.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: with heat produced wholly or partly by a radiant body, e.g. by a perforated plate

note.note-paragraph:
Groups F24C3/04, F24C3/042, F24C3/045, F24C3/047, and F24C3/06 are incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F24C3/14.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: without any visible flame
Arrangement or mounting of burners
Arrangement or mounting of ignition devices
Arrangement or mounting of control or safety devices
with special adaptation for travelling, e.g. collapsible

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24C3/14 is impacted by reclassification into groups F24C3/02, F24C3/022, F24C3/025, F24C3/027, F24C3/04, F24C3/042, F24C3/045, F24C3/047, and F24C3/06.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Stoves or ranges for liquid fuels

reference.text: stoves or ranges specially adapted for the use of two or more kinds of fuel or energy supply F24C1/02

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24C5/00 is impacted by reclassification into group F24C1/02.
Groups F24C5/00 and F24C1/02 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: with evaporation burners, e.g. dish type

note.note-paragraph:
Groups F24C5/02, F24C5/04, F24C5/06, and F24C5/08 are incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F24C5/20.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: wick type
adjustable
with heat produced wholly or partly by a radiant body
with atomising burners

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24C5/10 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F24C5/20.
Groups F24C5/20 and F24C5/10 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Arrangement or mounting of burners
Arrangement or mounting of ignition devices
Arrangement or mounting of control or safety devices
Liquid-fuel supply arrangements forming parts of stoves or ranges
with special adaptation for travelling, e.g. collapsible

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24C5/20 is impacted by reclassification into groups F24C5/02, F24C5/04, F24C5/06, F24C5/08, and F24C5/10.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Stoves or ranges heated by electric energy

reference.text: stoves or ranges specially adapted for the use of two or more kinds of fuel or energy supply F24C1/02

title-part.text: using microwaves
with heat radiated directly from the heating element

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24C7/04 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F24C7/10.
Group F24C7/04 is also impacted by reclassification into groups F24C7/043 and F24C7/046.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group F24C7/043 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F24C7/04.
Groups F24C7/04 and F24C7/043 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group F24C7/046 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F24C7/04.
Groups F24C7/04 and F24C7/046 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Arrangement or mounting of electric heating elements
Arrangement or mounting of control or safety devices

CPC-specific-text.text: on ranges, e.g. control panels, illumination

title-part.text: with special adaptation for travelling, e.g. collapsible

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24C7/10 is impacted by reclassification into groups F24C7/04 and F24C7/105.
Groups F24C7/04, F24C7/10, and F24C7/105 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group F24C7/105 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group F24C7/10.
Groups F24C7/10 and F24C7/105 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Stoves or ranges heated by a single type of energy supply not covered by groups F24C3/00 - F24C7/00 or subclass F24B

reference.text: solar heat collectors for heating objects, e.g. solar cookers F24S20/30

title-part.text: Combinations of two or more stoves or ranges, e.g. each having a different kind of energy supply
Stoves or ranges with additional provisions for heating water

reference.text: mounting arrangements of water heaters or water-heating elements F24H1/00

title-part.text: Stoves or ranges having self-cleaning provisions, e.g. continuous catalytic cleaning or electrostatic cleaning
pyrolytic type
Details

CPC-specific-text.text: for stoves of the closed type
Arrangements for circulation of cooling air

title-part.text: Doors specially adapted for stoves or ranges

reference.text: sealings for wings in general E06B7/16

CPC-specific-text.text: Mounting of doors, e.g. hinges, counterbalancing
stowing of door in open position
located at bottom side of housing

title-part.text: with transparent panels

CPC-specific-text.text: being dismountable, e.g. giving access for cleaning

Foundations or supports plates
Legs or pillars
Casings
Wheels
Tops, e.g. hot plates
Rings

reference.text: cover lids or splash guards F24C15/12; spillage trays or grooves F24C15/14

CPC-specific-text.text: Arrangements of connectors, grounding, supply wires
Constructive details concerning the regulation of the temperature
Mounting of hot plate on worktop

title-part.text: Side rests
Side plates
Cover lids
Splash guards
Racks outside ovens, e.g. for drying plates
Spillage trays or grooves
Shelves, racks or trays inside ovens
Supports therefor

CPC-specific-text.text: Co-operating with a door, e.g. operated by the door

title-part.text: Arrangement of compartments additional to cooking compartments, e.g. for warming or for storing utensils or fuel containers
Arrangement of additional heating or cooking apparatus, e.g. grills
Removing cooking fumes

reference.text: parts, details or accessories of cooking-vessels for withdrawing or condensing cooking vapours from such vessels A47J36/38

CPC-specific-text.text: with means for oxidation of cooking fumes
Arrangement or mounting of control or safety systems

reference.text: F24C15/2021 takes precedence; filters per se B01D46/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Devices for removing cooking fumes structurally associated with a cooking range
with means for oxidation of cooking fumes

title-part.text: Reflectors for radiation heaters
Radiant bodies or panels for radiation heaters

reference.text: gas burners for producing infra-red radiation F23D14/12

title-part.text: Handles for carrying
Draught shields
Arrangements for mounting stoves or ranges in particular locations
Arrangements of ducts for hot gases, e.g. in or around baking ovens
Elements and arrangements for heat storage or insulation
Protective guards, e.g. for preventing access to heated parts
